mapper.sql: SELECT CRS_CD , SBJ_CD , SBJ_ODR , REG_NO , (SELECT B.SBJ_NM FROM tb_crs_onln_sbj B WHERE A.SBJ_CD = B.SBJ_CD) SBJ_NM , (SELECT B.WIN_MENU_USE_YN FROM tb_crs_onln_sbj B WHERE A.SBJ_CD = B.SBJ_CD) WIN_MENU_USE_YN , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.REG_NO)) AS REG_NM , REG_DTTM , MOD_NO , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.MOD_NO)) AS MOD_NM , MOD_DTTM FROM tb_cro_open_crs_sbj A WHERE A.CRS_CD = #{crsCd}
mapper.select: SELECT A.CRS_CD , A.SBJ_CD , A.SBJ_ODR , A.REG_NO , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.REG_NO)) AS REG_NM , A.REG_DTTM , A.MOD_NO , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.MOD_NO)) AS MOD_NM , A.MOD_DTTM , B.SBJ_NM , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_crs_sbj_cnts WHERE SBJ_CD = A.SBJ_CD ) AS CONTENTS_CNT FROM tb_cro_open_crs_sbj A, tb_crs_onln_sbj B WHERE A.CRS_CD = #{crsCd} AND A.SBJ_CD = B.SBJ_CD ORDER BY SBJ_ODR
